task.title: Starting the Calculator Tool
task.shortdesc: Here you will the information about starting with your calculator.

context.p: Your Windows computer comes with an integrated Calculator tool. This tool allows you to perform various types of calculations ranging from basic arithmetic operations (subtract, divide, multiply) to advanced operations such as calculating a square root.

step.cmd: Click on your Windows start button.
In the search bar, type Calculator. The system will show a list of results including the Calculator tool.
Click the Calculator tool in the list of found applications.

result.p: The Calculator tool is started and is ready to use.
